description: Situated in a small garden in the historic centre, this modern bistro has a light, airy feel thanks to its large windows and its outdoor tables perfect for alfresco dining in summer. The young kitchen staff, supervised by a talented chef and with plenty of experience behind them, serve contemporary cuisine with an individual flavour. Simple aperitif-style options are available between 6 and 8pm.
